channel.title: MarketWatch.com - Top Stories
channel.description: MarketWatch, a leading publisher of business and financial news, offers users up-to-the minute news, investment tools, and subscription products.

item.title: Earnings Outlook: AMC’s third-quarter results on deck: Will the meme-stock darling shake off concerns of a box-office slowdown?
item.description: The movie-theater operator faced a 'dearth' of major movie releases in August and September.

item.title: Washington Watch: For EVs, solar tax breaks and climate change, here are the midterm elections that matter
item.description: Climate may not top inflation in these midterms, but the younger the voter, the more important the topic. Clean-energy jobs and tax incentives are at stake.

item.title: The Margin: Apple’s AR glasses could be pushed back to 2025 or 2026 amid ‘design issues’, says analyst
item.description: The tech giant’s augmented- and virtual-reality moves are being closely monitored.

item.title: : Think you had a bad week? Salesforce, cloud companies had some of their worst weeks ever
item.description: Salesforce Inc. was probably the biggest cloud-software company to shed red this week, as the lining in cloud-software stocks Friday was blood red instead of silver, sending some cloud companies and ETFs tracking the industry to some of their worst weeks ever.

item.title: : Apple and Google stocks just had their worst week in more than two years
item.description: Shares of Apple Inc. and Alphabet Inc. both suffered their largest weekly declines since the beginning days of the pandemic as Big Tech companies continued to draw closer scrutiny on Wall Street.

item.title: The MarketWatch 50: This oil company backed by Warren Buffett is America’s hottest stock. Why won’t its CEO pump more oil?
item.description: ‘There's no pressure to increase production’: Vicki Hollub’s Occidental dominates America's biggest oil field, landing her on the MarketWatch 50 list.

item.title: : Credit carnage spurs bargains on bonds tied to $16 trillion pile of U.S. household debt
item.description: 'I don't think there's an appreciation for just how cheap a lot of the bonds are out there,' says John Kerschner, head of U.S. securitized products at Janus Henderson Investors.

item.title: Next Avenue: What neuroscientists have learned about rejuvenating the aging brain—and what you can do too
item.description: Some techniques that rejuvenate blood may hold promise for improving the performance of the aging human brain in the future. But there's plenty we can do on our own.

item.title: The MarketWatch 50: Morgan Housel turned lessons he learned as a hotel valet into a breakthrough personal-finance book that’s sold 2.2 million copies in 2 years
item.description: Publishers said ‘The Psychology of Money’ would never work. Now, Morgan Housel is on the MarketWatch 50 list of the most influential people in markets.

item.title: FA Center: Panic is not an investment strategy. How financial advisers can help you think through the unthinkable.
item.description: Prepare for the worst and hope for the best.
